message.content:
7-Day Healthy Meal Plan (no dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, or cashews)

Day 1:
Breakfast: Veggie Omelette with Spinach, Tomatoes, and Mushrooms served with whole grain toast and avocado slices.
Lunch: Grilled Chicken Salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and a lemon-tahini dressing.
Dinner: Baked Salmon with quinoa and steamed asparagus, drizzled with olive oil and lemon juice.
Snack: Fresh fruit salad (kiwi, strawberries, blueberries, and pineapple).

Day 2:
Breakfast: Chia Seed Pudding made with coconut milk, topped with mixed berries and a sprinkle of hemp seeds.
Lunch: Lentil Soup with carrots, celery, and diced tomatoes, served with whole grain bread.
Dinner: Stuffed Bell Peppers filled with brown rice, black beans, corn, onions, and cilantro, topped with salsa.
Snack: Baby carrots with hummus dip.

Day 3:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with frozen mixed berries, spinach, flax seeds, and coconut water.
Lunch: Grilled Portobello Mushrooms stuffed with quinoa, sun-dried tomatoes, and basil pesto, served on a bed of arugula.
Dinner: Baked Sweet Potato topped with black beans, avocado, salsa, and fresh cilantro.
Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter.

Day 4:
Breakfast: Overnight Oats made with unsweetened almond milk, mixed berries, and a drizzle of agave nectar (if desired).
Lunch: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad with cucumber, cherry tomatoes, olives, red onion, and feta cheese (use dairy-free feta if available).
Dinner: Turkey Meatballs served over spaghetti squash with marinara sauce and a side of steamed green beans.
Snack: Rice cakes topped with mashed avocado and cherry tomatoes.

Day 5:
Breakfast: Green Smoothie Bowl made with spinach, banana, frozen mango, and coconut water, topped with sliced almonds (if not restricted).
Lunch: Thai-Style Chicken Salad with mixed greens, red cabbage, carrots, cucumber, and a peanut-free dressing.
Dinner: Baked Chicken with roasted Brussels sprouts and sweet potatoes, drizzled with olive oil and lemon juice.
Snack: Sliced bell peppers with tzatziki sauce (use dairy-free yogurt if available).

Day 6:
Breakfast: Coconut Flour Pancakes made with coconut milk and topped with fresh fruit and a drizzle of agave nectar (if desired).
Lunch: Caprese Salad with fresh tomatoes, basil leaves, and dairy-free mozzarella cheese, served with whole grain bread.
Dinner: Stuffed Zucchini Boats filled with ground turkey, brown rice, onions, garlic (avoided), bell peppers, and Italian herbs, topped with marinara sauce.
Snack: Fresh fruit salad (orange, grapefruit, and kiwi).

Day 7:
Breakfast: Acai Bowl made with acai puree, unsweetened almond milk, banana, and topped with granola and mixed berries.
Lunch: Grilled Shrimp Salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and a lemon-tahini dressing.
Dinner: Eggplant Parmesan made with dairy-free mozzarella cheese, served with whole wheat spaghetti and marinara sauce.
Snack: Sliced cucumbers with tzatziki sauce (use dairy-free yogurt if available).

Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and adjust portion sizes according to your specific needs. Enjoy these nutritious meals!
